name: Demonsweeper
description:
Demon Sweeper is a game made for the Brackey's Game Jam

A new sport called Chaos was invented by the immortal beings to serve as eternal enjoyment.  They would throw innocent people inside an infinite dungeon known as the Labyrinth, unarmed and indulge in enjoyment brought by the monsters hurting them. The MC grew tired of the disgusting and distasteful methods of the immortal beings and decided to break into the dungeon and end it once and for all.  But beware bold traveler there are demons that have a lot of power. 

Controls- WASD movement, Click- Shoot

Tactical Tip :- Check the bottom right corner of the screen if you want to find the exit. ¬‿¬  

Features:-

  • Endlessly generating worlds
  • Smooth animations
  • C H A O S
  • Cool music

This game was made by a team of 3- an artist, a composer and a programmer.

Artist-https://www.instagram.com/shuubiee/

Composer- James Lindsay music 

Programmer- TheDarkNight - itch.io

Extra Links-

  • The Music  https://soundcloud.com/jameslindsaysound/sets/demonsweeper-ost
